fest-assert v. 0.3-SNAPSHOT

This document is the API specification for the FEST "Flexible Assertions" Module 0.3-SNAPSHOT.

See:
          Description

Packages
org.fest.assertions Assertion methods bound to the type they apply.

 

This document is the API specification for the FEST "Flexible Assertions" Module 0.3-SNAPSHOT.

Currently, this module provides assertions that apply to the following data types:

  1. Objects
  2. Strings
  3. Collections
  4. Primitives (boolean, int, char, etc.)
  5. Array of Objects
  6. Array of primitives
  7. BufferedImages

Quick example: 

int removed = employees.removeFired();
assertThat(removed).isZero();
 
List<Employee> newEmployees = employees.hired(TODAY);
assertThat(newEmployees).hasSize(6);
